tool_description: This api show the NBA games that happend in that day as well as the results of the game and the games schedule to happen
title: NBA Games based on date

api_list.name: NBA games based on date
api_list.description: This end point takes a 'GET' request with a date as a parameter and returns a json with the games and results of that day
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-games-based-on-date.p.rapidapi.com/nba/{date}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-games-based-on-date.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
